Content.Text: NoMsg

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>! What's up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>What, you think I'm a little energetic for this early
in the morning? Well, yeah! It's a brand new day!
C'mon, up and at 'em!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What's up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...Well, that was a lousy greeting, <MYNAME>.
C'mon, do it again!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Whaaat's UUUUUP?! ...All right, that's a little
better. ♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>? You're here bright and
early. That's the way to get it done!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you look busy, <MYNAME>! Yeah, I'm a little
busy myself!
<PAGE>
I'm in charge of taking care of Dessie. Got a lotta
things to do between now and sundown!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you had lunch already?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Pepita usually cooks for us, but her tastes are
pretty much the exact opposite of mine...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>Everything she makes tastes soooo sweet! I
want some SPICY food, dang it!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Part of my job is doing Dessie's laundry.
<PAGE>
She comes back with her clothes dirty every day
-- somehow -- so it's important to make sure
she always has something clean to wear.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! Still working hard at this hour?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I like people who always give it their best shot!
Effort's the best thing in the world!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'm taking care of the laundry now, so I won't
have to do it later.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Phew, glad I can say I worked hard today. ♪

Content.VardId: 天気・季節ＭＳＧ（会話フラグOFFでしゃべる）

Content.Text:
<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Gorgeous out today, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>You know, it's so warm and nice out, I kinda
wanna just take a nap...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...Nope! Nope, can't do that! Gotta do laundry!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Dang it, rain!
<PAGE>
Hmm? What, you think I shouldn't talk like that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Hey, put yourself in my shoes. I washed all the
laundry, and now I can't dry any of it.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you like the summer, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I love it! Clear summer days are the best.
Especially for drying laundry!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hate rainy days, but I like summer rain for some
reason.
<PAGE>
The rain really brings out the smell of grass and
soil. Plus I love the fresh air.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>The only hard part is trying to dry laundry in the
rain. Guess I don't care for that too much.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's getting cooler out, isn't it? It's a nice fall day
today.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, here I am again. The laundry's all wet, and
there's no way to dry it.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know how in winter, the sun's not out as
much?
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...Yeah, that makes it a whole lot harder to dry
the laundry...

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I really hate winter. Less sun means I can't dry
the laundry half the time.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Whoa?! What are you doing here?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I don't care how tough you are, you get yourself
home before you catch a cold!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
It's c-cold...
<PAGE>
Wait, no, it's not! It's not cold at all! It's all in my
head! Mind over matter. The fire in my heart and
soul is all the heat I n-n-n...
<PAGE>
...Achoo!!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We're Dessie's watchdogs!
<PAGE>
Yeah, I like the sound of that. "Watchdogs!" So
cool.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Dessie's out of town for a while, so it's on us to
watch the place until she gets back.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where did Dessie go? Well, I suppose it couldn't
hurt to relax a BIT while she's gone...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Yeah, I'll just relax. It'll be a good thing.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Dessie can be tough to deal with sometimes,
but by deity standards, she's actually pretty nice!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I don't care much for spring. At least not for all
the pink that shows up everywhere.
<PAGE>
Real men like red. That's the color of their souls!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Careful with the mushrooms around here. A lot
of them are poisonous.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I wanna catch a big beetle this year.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Daaang, it's hot today!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But that's the way summer should be, don't you
think?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A lot of poison mushrooms pop up around here
in the spring...
<PAGE>
But this time of year, they're all perfectly edible.
<PAGE>
...So I guess poison mushrooms have their
season.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, you know it's summer when you hear the
cicadas chirping like crazy!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Man, I miss summer already...
<PAGE>
Three whole seasons to wait until the next one
comes along.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Trumpet mushrooms have a weird shape... They
don't really look like mushrooms at all, do they?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, I caught a red-suited cricket around here
the other day! Amazing, huh?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Cold? Do I look cold to you?
<PAGE>
I-I'm not! I've got all the fire I need right here
inside!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, a snowball! Right, time to throw it at
Pepita...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...Oh, uh, you didn't hear that!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder why long-horned grasshoppers sing
like that.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
There're a lot of insects around here! Any big
ones?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Fishing in the river looks fun! Kicking back at the
shore with a fishing rod in hand...that's a man's
favorite dream.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Not all insect species come out at the same time
of day.
<PAGE>
If there's one you can't find while the sun's out,
try coming back at night!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What do you think about in summertime?
Swimming in the river, right? Man, that must
feel great right about now!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, a while back, Flik got caught in a fish
trap.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>We pulled him out, but yeah, we all had a big
scare that day.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Do you know about violet husk fireflies?
<PAGE>
I've seen them around here, but I've never caught
one.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Red leaves are gorgeous... The only thing more
gorgeous is the view in spring. Except for all
that pink...

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see regular branches lying around all the time,
but then sometimes I see these black branches.
<PAGE>
What's their deal? Where'd they come from?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I saw a dorcus curvidens beetle the other day!
<PAGE>
Awesome, right? I'll show it to you sometime!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Looks like we can skate on the river! How cool
is that?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, those snowballs in the road aren't
always just snowballs. You can find things
inside them sometimes.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bah, I can't find any insects when it gets this
cold. I should come up with something else to
do!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know what you can grow on a fruit farm,
besides fruit? Trees, for lumber!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear a rumor there's a plant called bamboo
somewhere in the world.
<PAGE>
I wonder what it's like.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Something just flew out of the ground!
<PAGE>
Turned out it was just a grasshopper. Don't
scare me like that!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear there's a fruit somewhere called a
"banana."
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>They say it's ridiculously sweet...

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Fruits are always too sweet for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I want something spicy, dang it.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Don't you think the name "emma field cricket"
sounds cool? I wanna add one to my collection.
♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Somewhere out in the world, there's a country
that makes "chili peppers."
<PAGE>
They sound super spicy. I wanna try one!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I keep hearing about these spices called "chili
peppers." ...If you get a hold of one, you should
start growing them around here.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Today's target is emperor dragonflies! I'm gonna
catch one for sure! ♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, yeah, <MYNAME>, I was going to tell you:
Just so you know, you can't harvest tea leaves
during winter.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Out of curiosity, do you know about sugar
canes?
<PAGE>
I guess you can make sugar out of them...
<PAGE>
Not that I'd care to have any. They sound way
too sweet for me.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's wintertime, so all the insects are tucked
away in their cozy little insect beds. And here I
am, bored out of my mind.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, something I heard from Flik...
<PAGE>
If you spray perfume over a beehive, the beehive
gives you better honey.
<PAGE>
Well, "better" meaning "sweeter," so it's not for
me, but you know.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You can make perfume out of flowers. If you
want to give it a shot, try all kinds and see what
you come up with.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Explore out here in the country, and you'll find
things you'd never see in the big city. Fireflies,
for example.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Have you ever tried growing mushrooms? I think
there's one tree that grows 'em better than any
other.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, you can plant mushroom seeds right
on a tree. Give it time, and they'll grow right
there.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'd gotten a tip that there was a Hercules beetle
right around here, but I can't find it now.
<PAGE>
They're never easy to catch.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When you hear someone talk about "tall crops,"
they mean cucumbers, tomatoes and so on.
Eggplants, too, but they're seasonal.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hear western honey bees like a certain perfume.
"Hilltop Sky," it's called.
<PAGE>
I don't know how to make it, though.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
I like collecting insects, but I don't wanna be
around bees!
<PAGE>
They're scary, don't you think? You ever gotten
stung? I mean, I haven't, but it's gotta hurt!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Bees don't really make new honey in winter, just
so you know.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know about blue roses?
<PAGE>
They're related to red and pink roses, but they're
blue! They're supposed to be ridiculously rare.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Argh, I wanted to mess with Pepita, but I need
bugs for that, and I can't find any.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That farm over there is good for leafy vegetables.
<PAGE>
Cabbages are in season, you know.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are apples in season now? I smell 'em
everywhere I go.
<PAGE>
...Oh, it's chamomile. Come to think of it, I hear
chamomile and apples smell alike.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know, you won't always find the rare
insects you're looking for, but don't feel too bad.
There's always next year!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, did you know this?
<PAGE>
Onions are classified as root vegetables. Torque
told me all about 'em. She knows everything,
huh?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
When are pumpkins in season? Summer? I
always get it wrong and think it's in fall for some
reason.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Check it out!
My whole collection of insects! Pretty awesome,
yeah?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Fall's root vegetables are yams and carrots. I
don't know why, but yams are popular with the
ladies.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Why do girls always have to have a sweet tooth?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? What's that smell, lavender? It's nice...
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>...No, no, forget that! I don't go around sniffing
pretty flowers!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So you know how fish hatcheries work, right? I
wonder if we could take the same basic idea and
make one for insects.
<PAGE>
...No? You think it wouldn't work? Bah.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You know how you can tell radishes are root
vegetables? 'Cause they look like big roots!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Ever notice how hills look bigger in the snow? If
I rolled down from the top of a hill to the
bottom, I'd turn into a snowman.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Haaa! Taaa!
<PAGE>
Oh, <MYNAME>. I was practicing my insect
catching.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, so if you irrigate from the river, you can
make a paddy, huh?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, do you do much fishing?
<PAGE>
There are all kinds of fish in the water around
here.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I like catching insects. It's a manly hobby, I say!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Crops that grow in paddies grow in all seasons.
In some ways, they're easier to grow than other
crops.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I keep hearing rumors about "king" fish in the
water around here.
<PAGE>
I've never seen them, but I wanna catch them
someday.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, I'm gonna catch all the insects I can
today! Summer is insect-catching season!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you have crops growing in a paddy, you don't
need to water them.
<PAGE>
Makes it easier, I guess, but maybe a little too
easy...

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
How are you at fishing these days?
<PAGE>
I think salmon are in season right now.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You wanna know how to get better at collecting
insects? Keep a sharp eye on the bushes!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So even when the rivers and the lakes are frozen
up top, there're fish living under the ice, right?
<PAGE>
Man, they must be freezing down there.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm, paddies don't freeze in winter, do they?
<PAGE>
...Why is that?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I wonder why long-horned grasshoppers sing
like that.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
My motto is, "Passion, effort and toughness!"
<PAGE>
Even if it's just laundry, I'll give it my all!
Raaahhh!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We all devote our lives to caring for Dessie...
<PAGE>
But for Nature Sprites like us, that's a real
honorable job. ♪

Content.VardId: プレイヤーが渡した、見せたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
O-oh, wow, you're giving this to me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Did you know it was my favorite? Thank you! I
appreciate it. ♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh! For me, huh?
<PAGE>
How'd you know what I like, <MYNAME>? Thank
you!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Nice! I like these. ♪ Thanks!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, is this for me? Thanks, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is this?
<PAGE>
Eh, I don't much care for this kinda thing...but,
since it's a gift, sure, I'll take it.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What is this?
<PAGE>
I'm sorry, but I'm really not a fan of these... Eh,
okay, I'll take it.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
Listen, I don't like sweets.
<PAGE>
And I hate this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> stuff
more than anything!
<PAGE>
*sigh* Seriously, just looking at it is making me
queasy.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow! Nice sparkle.
<PAGE>
...Wait, this is for me? Really?
<PAGE>
Thanks! I appreciate it. ♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, sparkly.
<PAGE>
...Wait, this is for me? Really?
<PAGE>
Thanks! I appreciate it. ♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Wow, sparkly.
<PAGE>
Is this for me? Thank you!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What is this? It's sparkly, whatever it is.
<PAGE>
I don't usually care for these things, but...I'll take
it, since you're giving it to me.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
What is this? It's sparkly, whatever it is.
<PAGE>
I don't really care for these at all...but, since it's
a present, I'll go ahead and take it.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
...
<PAGE>
Listen, I don't like sweets.
<PAGE>
And I hate this <BLUE><ITEMNAME0></BLUE> stuff
more than anything!
<PAGE>
Sparkly or not, I hate it.
<PAGE>
*sigh* Seriously, just looking at it wears me
out.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you want to give me something else?
<PAGE>
Nah, you just gave me something. Thanks for
the thought, though.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, it's a rabbit! Hello!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, long time no see! How have you been?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, an ermine! These guys are always helping us
out. Much appreciated!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hmm? You're a newcomer, huh? Wait, have we
met before...?

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What? A flower?
<PAGE>
I'm not really a flower kinda guy, but if it's part
of some fair, well...
<PAGE>
Sure, I'll take it. Thank you.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hey, now!! Found your better half, huh?
<PAGE>
Yeah, that's awesome! Just remember, your
buddy Gusto always has your back.

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A ring! You planning on giving it to somebody?
<PAGE>
Yeah, go for it, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, you wrapped this for me?
<PAGE>
And this is my favorite color. I'm flattered!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, you wrapped this for me? Thanks!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
What's up, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
Today's your birthday, right? I brought you a
little something. ♪

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's up, <MYNAME>! Today's your birthday,
right?
<PAGE>
Happy birthday, <MYNAME>!

Content.VardId: 会話間隔が空いていたＭＳＧ

Content.Text:
<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well, look who it is! <MYNAME>, isn't it?!
<PAGE>
Been a long time, huh? Next time you see me,
just walk up and chat!

<FACE_CUSTO><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hey, come on. You're hard-working as heck, but
we've all got our limits. Go get some sleep!
